dmca.title: bbfine.com COPYRIGHT abuse
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Cheryl Tallman [mailto:camoell@chartermi.net] 
Sent: Thursday, March 03, 2005 3:27 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Cheryl Tallman
Subject: bbfine.com COPYRIGHT abuse


Hello Mr. Lance Crosby,
 
I was recently notified through an affiliate program inquiry that
<http://www.bbfine.com/> www.bbfine.com is using the copy written content
from my company, Fresh Baby ( <http://www.myfreshbaby.com/>
www.myfreshbaby.com). The owners of the bbfine.com domain name host their
web site at theplanet.com   
 
Bbfine.com is a complete duplicate of the myfreshbaby.com web site.  They
have altered our company logo (to remove our name) and changed all the
references of Fresh Baby to Bbfine.  However, they have NOT changed the
personnel names, phone numbers or addresses.  In addition, the links to our
newsletter service and our online store are intact.  I am concerned that
this company (domain) may be stealing credit card information or email
addresses from my customers. Our newsletter is published monthly and
archived on our Web site . Based on the content on Bbfine.com, it looks like
the site was copied over sometime in AUG/SEP 2004  (
<http://www.bbfine.com/healthy_eating/archive.cfm>
http://www.bbfine.com/healthy_eating/archive.cfm)
 
We have never given bbfine.com permission to use or copy any of the material
on  <http://www.myfreshbaby.com> www.myfreshbaby.com.  To our knowledge, no
one from bbfine.com has ever contacted anyone at Fresh Baby. I would like to
request that you shut this site down immediately because of theft of copy
written content (the content on our site clearly states copy write 2002 and
bbfine.com states 2004).  
 
I am an the CEO and owner of Fresh Baby,  The information provided in this
e-mail is accurate and truthful. I am authorized to act on behalf of the
complaining party, Fresh Baby. I appreciate your prompt attention to this
matter. Please provide me with a status and contact information.
 
Sincerely,
Cheryl Tallman 
(signature attached) and full contact information below

Cheryl Tallman
Fresh Baby
616 Petoskey Street
Suite 202
Petoskey, MI 49770
P:(231) 348-2706
F:(231) 348-5374
E:cheryl.tallman@freshbaby.com
W:http://www.freshbaby.com <http://www.freshbaby.com/> 

Sign up for Fresh Ideas and get great tips on healthy eating for your
family.  http://www.myfreshbaby.com/healthy_eating/archive.cfm
